participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Caring and introspective, I value deep connections and enjoy sharing my interests with others.
participant_1.background: I am allergic to lactose. I am really terrible at doing regular expressions. I like having fried fish for supper. My favorite singer is Justin Bieber. My doctor told me I have six months to live.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, I love exploring new things and meeting new people.
participant_2.background: I have a rose tattooed on my right ankle. I am studying to be a dental hygienist but I hate seeing patients' saliva. I work in a doctor's office. I only wear silver jewelry. There are thorns tattooed on my toes.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, my name is participant_2.
Nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and play video games.
Me too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but my favorite are mystery novels.
I love mystery novels too! What's your favorite mystery novel?
My favorite mystery novel is "The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo" by Stieg Larsson.
That's a great book! I read it a few years ago and I really enjoyed it.
It's so good! I'm glad you liked it.
So, what kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch all kinds of movies, but my favorite are action movies.
Me too! What's your favorite action movie?
My favorite action movie is "The Fast and the Furious".
That's a great movie! I love the car chases.
Me too! They're so intense.
So, what kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but my favorite are adventure games.
Me too! What's your favorite adventure game?
My favorite adventure game is "The Legend of Zelda".
That's a great game! I love the dungeons.
Me too! They're so challenging.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go camping, hiking, and fishing.
I love camping too! What's your favorite camping spot?
My favorite camping spot is in the mountains.
That sounds amazing! I love the mountains.
Me too! I love the fresh air and the beautiful scenery.
So, what are you studying to be?
I'm studying to be a dental hygienist.
That's cool! I've always been interested in dentistry.
It's a great job! I love working with people and helping them improve their oral health.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great dental hygienist.
Thanks! I hope so too.
